comment:
I thought I'd take a break from typing about Dramfest whiskies to 10 days later actually drinking one. To be honest for a whole week after just thinking about the stuff made me feel very physically nauseous...it took 5 days for my tongue to revert back from black.

Anyhow like a good athlete after a viscous physical game a long rest makes everything ok...hopefully anyway...it's hard to assess internal organs.

Anyhow this is a nice dram to ease me back in, nice safe, low alcohol and complexity, bubble gum honey flavour. Ok liver back into it...
